system.novice: Navigator makes Opposed Willpower Test vs all living beings looking into their Warp eye (Navigator tests once, all others compare to it). Target Immediately Rolls on Halluciongen Table (5-5, Page 126, Rogue Trader), effects last for Degree of Success Rounds. Navigator gains 1 Fatigue. Non-living, Untouchable, or Daemonic/Warp targets are immune. Forewarned/Unaware targets have +30 on Roll to resist.
system.adept: Target adds +20 to Roll on Hallucinogen Table, and automaticaly gains 2 Insanity. If Navigator fails test, they gain 1 Insanity in addition to the 1 Fatigue.
system.master: Target rolls twice on Warp Travel Hallucinations Table (2-5, Page 31, Navis Primer) with +50 on each result, and gains 1d5+1 Insanity. If Navigator Fails, they roll on Hallucinogen Table and suffer results in addition to prior effects.
